long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Sling Kong is an exciting and addictive game available as a Chrome extension. It can also be played for free on the website monkeymart.org. In Sling Kong, players take on the role of adorable and quirky characters, such as monkeys and other animals, as they try to climb as high as possible using elastic ropes. The goal is to reach new heights while avoiding obstacles and collecting power-ups along the way. The game features colorful and vibrant graphics, smooth controls, and a variety of challenging levels to keep players engaged. Whether you're looking for a quick gaming session or a longer playtime, Sling Kong offers fun and entertainment for players of all ages. Give it a try and see how high you can sling kong!

*Note: We have added "Classroom 6x" button, making it easy for players to quickly access the games on our website! https://classroom-6x.org/, https://monkeymart.org/
